description: Microsoft Teams integrates chat, video meetings, and file storage within Microsoft 365, providing virtual collaboration and communication for distributed teams

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_ADD_MEMBER_TO_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to add a user to a Microsoft Teams team. Use when granting or updating membership for a user.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_ARCHIVE_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to archive a Microsoft Teams team. Use after confirming the team ID; returns 202 if accepted.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_CHATS_GET_ALL_CHATS
capabilities.description: Retrieves all Microsoft Teams chats a specified user is part of, supporting filtering, property selection, and pagination.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_CHATS_GET_ALL_MESSAGES
capabilities.description: Retrieves all messages from a specified Microsoft Teams chat using the Microsoft Graph API, automatically handling pagination; ensure `chat_id` is valid and OData expressions in `filter` or `select` are correct.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_CREATE_MEETING
capabilities.description: Use to schedule a new standalone Microsoft Teams online meeting, i.e., one not linked to any calendar event.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_CREATE_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new Microsoft Teams team. Use when you need to provision a team with optional template, channels, and members.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_DELETE_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a Microsoft Teams team. Use after confirming the target team ID.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_GET_CHANNEL
capabilities.description: Tool to get a specific channel in a team. Use after obtaining valid team and channel IDs to fetch channel details.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_GET_CHAT_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to get a specific chat message. Use after confirming chat_id and message_id.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_GET_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to get a specific team. Use when full details of one team by ID are needed.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_LIST_MESSAGE_REPLIES
capabilities.description: Tool to list replies to a channel message. Use after obtaining team, channel, and message IDs.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_LIST_TEAM_MEMBERS
capabilities.description: Tool to list members of a Microsoft Teams team. Use when you need to retrieve the members of a specific team, for auditing or notifications.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_LIST_TEAMS_TEMPLATES
capabilities.description: Tool to list available Microsoft Teams templates. Use when retrieving templates for team creation or customization workflows.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_LIST_USERS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all users in the organization. Use when you need to retrieve directory users with filtering, pagination, and field selection.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_SEARCH_FILES
capabilities.description: Search files in Microsoft Teams using KQL syntax. Find files by name, type, content, author, and modification date across all Teams and channels. Supports boolean logic and date ranges. Examples: 'filetype:pdf AND lastmodifiedtime>=2024-10-01', 'contract AND budget', 'filename:report AND author:user@example.com'

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_SEARCH_MESSAGES
capabilities.description: Search Microsoft Teams messages using powerful KQL syntax. Supports sender (from:), date filters (sent:), attachments, and boolean logic. Works across all Teams chats and channels the user has access to. Examples: 'from:user@example.com AND sent>=2024-10-01', 'punchlist OR termination', 'sent>today-30 AND hasattachment:yes'

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_CREATE_CHANNEL
capabilities.description: Creates a new 'standard', 'private', or 'shared' channel within a specified Microsoft Teams team.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_CREATE_CHAT
capabilities.description: Creates a new chat; if a 'oneOnOne' chat with the specified members already exists, its details are returned, while 'group' chats are always newly created.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_GET_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific message from a Microsoft Teams channel using its Team, Channel, and Message IDs.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_LIST
capabilities.description: Retrieves Microsoft Teams accessible by the authenticated user, allowing filtering, property selection, and pagination.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_LIST_CHANNELS
capabilities.description: Retrieves channels for a specified Microsoft Teams team ID (must be valid and for an existing team), with options to include shared channels, filter results, and select properties.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_LIST_CHAT_MESSAGES
capabilities.description: Retrieves messages (newest first) from an existing and accessible Microsoft Teams one-on-one chat, group chat, or channel thread, specified by `chat_id`.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_LIST_PEOPLE
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of people relevant to a specified user from Microsoft Graph, noting the `search` parameter is only effective if `user_id` is 'me'.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_POST_CHANNEL_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Posts a new text or HTML message to a specified channel in a Microsoft Teams team.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_POST_CHAT_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Sends a non-empty message (text or HTML) to a specified, existing Microsoft Teams chat; content must be valid HTML if `content_type` is 'html'.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_TEAMS_POST_MESSAGE_REPLY
capabilities.description: Sends a reply to an existing message, identified by `message_id`, within a specific `channel_id` of a given `team_id` in Microsoft Teams.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_UNARCHIVE_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to unarchive a Microsoft Teams team. Use when you need to restore an archived team to active state.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_UPDATE_CHANNEL_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to update a message in a channel. Use when you need to modify an existing channel message after confirming channel and message IDs.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_UPDATE_CHAT_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to update a specific message in a chat. Use when you need to correct or modify a sent chat message.

capabilities.name: MICROSOFT_TEAMS_UPDATE_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to update the properties of a team. Use when you need to modify team settings such as member, messaging, or fun settings.
